1.0.name: wordpress/bmi-calculator
1.0.description: This BMI calculator can give out the BMI value as well as basic understandings based on age, height, and weight. It accepts both the units for the United States and the metric units. This calculator can be inserted either to the sidebar or into the post, but not both. Check http://www.calculator.net/bmi-calculator.html for a demo of this calculator.
